visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the following specifications: Chart type: spline, Chart title: Monthly Average Temperature, Axes and labels styling: Use a dark blue color for the title, labels, and axes with a font size of 14px, Data series: Include one series named 'Temperature' with the provided data, Custom colors: Use a gradient from light blue to dark blue for the series, Additional configurations: Set the chart background to a light gray color, add a legend at the bottom of the chart, and set the chart margins to 50 pixels on all sides.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and the background color is a light gray (#F5F5F5). The chart has a margin of 50 pixels on all sides. The title, axes labels, and legend text are styled with a dark blue color (#00008B) and a font size of 14px. The x-axis categories represent the months from January to December, and the y-axis title indicates the temperature in degrees Celsius. The tooltip background color is set to a light yellow (#FCFFC5). The legend is positioned at the bottom center of the chart. The data series is named 'Temperature' and includes the provided temperature data. The series color is a gradient from light blue (#ADD8E6) to dark blue (#00008B), creating a visually appealing effect.
